nodes.text: Point Tarron was a supposed location. During a Galactic Republic infiltration of the Citadel prison on Lola Sayu during the Clone Wars, a group led by Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi and including reprogrammed battle droids attempted to reach their shuttle on the prison's landing pad, after the astromech droid R2-D2 and the battle droids had freed them from being captured. OOM-10, the reprogrammed droid in the lead, claimed to the droids guarding the shuttle that they were transferring their "prisoners" to a supposed Separatist outpost at Point Tarron. The ruse nearly worked, but the guard droids were alerted to the escape attempt by tactical droid K2-B4, leading to a firefight at the landing platform and the eventual destruction of the shuttle.
The episode trivia guide for "Counterattack" words it that Point Tarron does not exist at all, saying that the fake outpost was Point Tarron.
